properties.name: fill
properties.description: Background color( default: null), if is null in png is transparent but not in jpg

properties.name: type
properties.description: If this is not defined, the new image will be automatically defined

properties.name: detach
properties.description: Detaches a view from dirty checking again of ApplicationRef.

methods.name: addStyle
methods.description: Add a new dynamic style, use only within @Input()

methods.description: Add new add a new style sheet

classes.name: Platform
classes.description: Service to detect the current platform by comparing the userAgent strings and checking browser-specific global properties.

variables.name: ALIGN_ALIAS
Breakpoints
variables.defaultValue:
{
  XSmall: '(max-width: 599px)',
  Small: '(min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 959px)',
  Medium: '(min-width: 960px) and (max-width: 1279px)',
  Large: '(min-width: 1280px) and (max-width: 1919px)',
  XLarge: '(min-width: 1920px)',

  Handset: '(max-width: 599px) and (orientation: portrait), ' +
           '(max-width: 959px) and (orientation: landscape)',
  Tablet: '(min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 839px) and (orientation: portrait), ' +
          '(min-width: 960px) and (max-width: 1279px) and (orientation: landscape)',
  Web: '(min-width: 840px) and (orientation: portrait), ' +
       '(min-width: 1280px) and (orientation: landscape)',

  HandsetPortrait: '(max-width: 599px) and (orientation: portrait)',
  TabletPortrait: '(min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 839px) and (orientation: portrait)',
  WebPortrait: '(min-width: 840px) and (orientation: portrait)',

  HandsetLandscape: '(max-width: 959px) and (orientation: landscape)',
  TabletLandscape: '(min-width: 960px) and (max-width: 1279px) and (orientation: landscape)',
  WebLandscape: '(min-width: 1280px) and (orientation: landscape)',
}

variables.name: LY_CHECKBOX_CONTROL_VALUE_ACCESSOR
LY_RADIO_CONTROL_VALUE_ACCESSOR
menuStyles
Size
styles
variables.defaultValue:
{
  fill: {
    position: 'absolute',
    top: 0,
    bottom: 0,
    left: 0,
    right: 0,
  },
  visuallyHidden: {
    border: 0,
    clip: 'rect(0 0 0 0)',
    height: '1px',
    margin: '-1px',
    overflow: 'hidden',
    padding: 0,
    position: 'absolute',
    width: '1px',
    outline: 0,
    '-webkit-appearance': 'none',
    '-moz-appearance': 'none'
  }
}

variables.name: styles
styles
variables.defaultValue:
({
  root: {
    '-webkit-user-select': 'none',
    '-moz-user-select': 'none',
    '-ms-user-select': 'none',
    userSelect: 'none',
    display: 'flex',
    overflow: 'hidden',
    position: 'relative',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    alignItems: 'center'
  },
  imgContainer: {
    cursor: 'move',
    position: 'absolute',
    top: 0,
    left: 0,
    '& > img': {
      width: '100%',
      height: '100%',
      pointerEvents: 'none',
    }
  },
  croppingContainer: {
    position: 'absolute',
    pointerEvents: 'none',
    boxShadow: '0 0 0 20000px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.29)',
    '&::after': {
      content: `''`,
      position: 'absolute',
      top: 0,
      left: 0,
      right: 0,
      bottom: 0,
      border: 'solid 2px rgb(255, 255, 255)'
    }
  },
  croppContent: {
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    position: 'absolute',
    top: 0,
    left: 0,
    right: 0,
    bottom: 0,
    '& *:not(input)': {
      pointerEvents: 'none'
    },
    '& > input': {
      position: 'absolute',
      background: 'transparent',
      opacity: 0,
      top: 0,
      left: 0,
      right: 0,
      bottom: 0,
      width: '100%',
      height: '100%'
    }
  }
})

variables.name: styles
variables.defaultValue:
({
  root: {
    '-webkit-user-select': 'none',
    '-moz-user-select': 'none',
    '-ms-user-select': 'none',
    userSelect: 'none',
    '-webkit-tap-highlight-color': 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    alignItems: 'center',
    background: 'transparent',
    border: 0,
    padding: 0,
    overflow: 'hidden',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    outline: 'none',
    boxSizing: 'border-box',
    color: 'currentColor',
    display: 'inline-flex',
    position: 'relative',
    textDecoration: 'none',
    borderRadius: '50%',
  },
  content: {
    display: 'flex',
    justifyContent: 'inherit',
    alignItems: 'inherit',
    width: 'inherit',
    height: 'inherit',
    overflow: 'inherit',
  }
})

propertiesClass.name: _controlValueAccessorChangeFn
propertiesClass.description: The method to be called in order to update ngModel

methodsClass.name: _touch
methodsClass.description: Mark this group as being "touched" (for ngModel). Meant to be called by the contained radio buttons upon their blur.

methodsClass.name: registerOnChange
methodsClass.description: Registers a callback to be triggered when the model value changes. Implemented as part of ControlValueAccessor.

methodsClass.name: registerOnTouched
methodsClass.description: Registers a callback to be triggered when the control is touched. Implemented as part of ControlValueAccessor.

methodsClass.name: setDisabledState
methodsClass.description: Sets the disabled state of the control. Implemented as a part of ControlValueAccessor.
